pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plandex is a terminal-based AI development tool that can plan and execute large coding tasks that span many steps and touch dozens of files. It can handle up to 2M tokens of context directly (~100k per file), and can index directories with 20M tokens or more using tree-sitter project maps.
Plandex 是一个基于终端的 AI 开发工具，可以规划和执行跨越多个步骤并涉及 数十个文件的大型编码任务。它可以直接处理多达 200 万个标记的上下文（每个 文件约 10 万个），并且可以使用 tree-sitter 项目映射索引 2000 万个标记或 更多的目录。
